metadata.title: Shopeedia - Demo
metadata.description: A Next.js boilerplate for building your online store instantly: simple, quick, powerful.

fnb.title: Food & Beverages
fnb.description: Discover a variety of delicious food and drinks for everyday needs and special occasions.

furniture.description: A wide range of quality furniture to enhance your home with elegant and modern designs.

men.description: Stay stylish with the latest men's fashion collection, from clothing to trendy accessories.

women.title: Women's Wear
women.description: Complete your style with a modern, elegant women's fashion collection full of variety.

beauty.title: Beauty
beauty.description: Beauty products for skin care, makeup, and body care to look beautiful and confident.

health.title: Health
health.description: Health products to maintain body balance, immunity, and daily care.

computer.description: Find the best computers and laptops for productivity, gaming, and daily needs.

phone.title: Phones & Tablets
phone.description: Discover the latest smartphones, tablets, and accessories for your daily communication needs.
